title: VPN 관해 질문이 있습니다.
content:
언제부터인지 업데이트 이후로 VPN 사용을 하게 되면

특정 사이트에서 "프록시 서버가 연결을 거부함" 문구가 뜨더군요 실행 안하고 할시에 보안연결실패로 접속이 됩니다.

구글의 크롬도 VPN 사용함 사용안함 둘다 적용하여도 사이트 접속이 됩니다

프록시 서버가 연결을 거부함로 사이트 접속이 안되는데 방법이 있을지요.
creator: aiceondfff

title: Most things work fine - I have Norton account.  when Norton detcts issue it throws up a pop-up, the text is HUGE & so huge that 3/4  of message is out of its window & can't be read - how to fix
content: bold textMost things work fine - I have Norton account. when Norton detcts issue it throws up a pop-up, the text is HUGE & so huge that 3/4 of message is out of its window & can't be read the full message & I can't access any action buttons in the message - how to fix this problem. Seems to only involve Norton - I haven't found a place in the Norton site system to make this request directly to them Win 11 - I tried various options in Display> scale, text size, etc. My old laptop is Win 10 and I don't have this problem. I've been using this win 11 laptop for about a year and included Norton most of that time - this problem just came up a couple months ago. I've tried a couple times to get to Norton about it but I get so frustrated that I give up. One picture shows the large screen pop-up. A smaller one pops up in lower right when I insert a thumb drive [ it wants to scan it for virus ] but i can't make it go away, it's right in the way of some important options that can come up beneath it on various apps [like my slider to move up & down the page], and it doesn't show up on screanshots, and Task Mgr> end task does nothing. I took a picture of it with my phone - I'll see if I can attach it here. Any suggestions on normalizing these , scale settings ?, access to Norton where I can deliver this same request - - would be greatly appreciated.
creator: combohan
